rows.label: qst200912_msg001
rows.name:
Thanks for getting a
hold of Otto for me!

rows.label: qst200912_msg002
rows.name:
I'm pleased to announce
that the mill's back in
perfect working order again!

rows.label: qst200912_msg003
rows.name:
If all goes well, we'll be back in
business starting tomorrow. That is,
if we can solve one other problem.

rows.label: qst200912_msg004
rows.name:
The shop may be fine, but
we're still a few ingredients
short for the bread itself.

rows.label: qst200912_msg005
rows.name:
You can thank that blimmin'
rampaging Armu for that.

rows.label: qst200912_msg007
rows.name:
We have a Nopon called Kupon who
fetches the ingredients for us.

rows.label: qst200912_msg008
rows.name:
He should normally be back by
now, but he hasn't shown up yet.

rows.label: qst200912_msg009
rows.name:
Oh, I hope he's not run
into any trouble...

rows.label: qst200912_msg011
rows.name:
Then could I ask you to go
and check on him for me?

rows.label: qst200912_msg012
rows.name:
Thanks so much. You're
being a massive help.

rows.label: qst200912_msg013
rows.name:
Hushview Bridge isn't so safe
these days, so just watch
your backs around there.

rows.label: qst200912_msg014
rows.name:
You saw Kupon around Hushview
Bridge, didn't you? With any luck,
he'll still be around there...
